login.title: Access System
login.safetyReminder: Don't forget to logout if you don't trust this computer

errors.networkUnavailable: Cannot connect to the server, please try again later
errors.notJson: Communication with server is blocked, please check your network connection
errors.apiVersionMismatch: Server has been updated, will reload the page to ensure compatibility
errors.upgradeLegacyEdgeBrowser: You are using a legacy version of Microsoft Edge browser, which is not supported. For all features to work properly, please upgrade to the new Edge.
errors.unsupportedIEBrowser: You are using Internet Explorer, which was released in 2013 and doesn't support all the latest web standards that make this app work. Please upgrade to a modern web browser, like Chrome, Firefox or the new Microsoft Edge.
